title: ARAM Random Character Selection
body:
I have an issue I would like to raise and get peoples thoughts on WRT the probability of getting champs you like or dislike in ARAM (randomness).
Two different points to take into account.
One - a person creates an account and only purchases the players they are pro with to reduce the (randomness) of getting characters that they are not good at thus increases the chance of getting a character they like.
Two - you use your account that has almost all characters, bear in mind normal people are not pro at all characters now this increases the chance of getting a character that you can not play well essentially you are penalised for having more characters on your account.

Summarisation is now the person who is honest and likes the versatility of picking in normal modes is being penalised for owning more characters in ARAM.

Solution is to maybe limit how many characters are available for randomness if you own over a certain amount? 

IDK, just thought I would put it out there.
